title: cf.client.bot
content:
`cf.client.bot` Boolean

Indicates whether the request originated from a known good bot or crawler.

Provides the same information as [`cf.bot_management.verified_bot`](https://developers.cloudflare.com/ruleset-engine/rules-language/fields/reference/cf.bot_management.verified_bot/).
